workflowtransition.conditionformula: ({employee.supervisor.id} is not null or {employee.purchaseorderapprover.id} is not null) and {custworkflow4_2.id}='T'

setfieldvalueaction.conditionformula: {employee.purchaseorderapprover.id} is not null and ({total}>{employee.purchaseorderlimit} or {employee.purchaseorderlimit} is null)
{employee.supervisor.id} is not null and {employee.purchaseorderapprover.id} is null and ({total}>{employee.purchaseorderlimit} or {employee.purchaseorderlimit} is null)

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!

You have a new purchase order to approve. 

Purchase Order No : {tranid}
Supplier : {entity}

Best Regards
NetSuite


Please follow the link below to approve / reject
sendemailaction.conditionformula: {nextapprover.id} is not null and {approvalstatus.id}=1 and {user.id} is not null
sendemailaction.subject: Purchase Request to Approve

workflowstatecustomfield.description: Purchase Approval Workflow : Entry Workflow State Field
workflowstatecustomfield.label: next Approver (3)

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Pending Approval Workflow State
workflowstate.name: Pending Approval

lockrecordaction.conditionformula: ({nextapprover.id}!={me} or ({nextapprover.id} is null and {me} is not null) or ({nextapprover.id} is not null and {me} is null))

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Set Next Approver Workflow State.
workflowstate.name: Set Next Approver

setfieldvalueaction.conditionformula: {nextapprover.supervisor.id} is not null and {nextapprover.purchaseorderapprovallimit}<{total} and {nextapprover.purchaseorderapprover.id} is null

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!

You have a new purchase order to approve. 

Purchase Order No : {tranid}
Supplier : {entity}

Best Regards
NetSuite

Please follow the link below to approve / reject
sendemailaction.subject: Purchase Order to Approve

workflowstatecustomfield.description: Purchase Approval Workflow : Set Next Approver Workflow State Field.
workflowstatecustomfield.help: Purchase Approval Workflow : Set Next Approver Workflow State Field.
workflowstatecustomfield.label: next approver (3)

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Approved Workflow State.
workflowstate.name: Approved

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!

Congratulations, your purchase order has been approved.

Purchase Order No : {tranid}
Supplier : {entity}

Best Regards

NetSuite
sendemailaction.conditionformula: {custbody_currentuser_hid.email} is not null and {custbody_bbs_ulh_created_by.email} is not null
sendemailaction.subject: Your Purchase Order has been approved

workflowstate.description: Purchase Approval Workflow Rejected Workflow State.
workflowstate.name: Rejected

sendemailaction.body:
Hello from NetSuite!

Unfortunately, your purchase order has been rejected.

Purchase Order No : {tranid}
Supplier : {entity}

Additional rejection information:
{custbody7}

Please amend and resubmit for approval, or delete as required

Best Regards
NetSuite
sendemailaction.conditionformula: {custbody_currentuser_hid.email} is not null and {custbody_bbs_ulh_created_by.email} is not null
sendemailaction.subject: Your Purchase Order has been rejected
